job_description:
Position: Senior Java Developer
Location: Mississauga, ON
Key Responsibilities:
·        Strong hands on core java knowledge with multi-threading, concurrency, collections etc.
·        Smart and flexible to work on a critical application
·        Experience of Agile development and scrums
·        Strong knowledge on Core Java(preferred version 8), Spring(Core, MVC, JDBC), Hibernate/JDBC/JPA/ORM, JSON, Oracle.
·        Must possess strong experience in SQL (SQL Queries, tuning etc)
·        Shell Scripting
·        UNIX
